title: The only champ that legitimately uses klepto is GP
body: And it's likely that he will be the sole reason why it can never be good for any other champion.

replies.body:
tried it
Not having press the attack mid-late really hampers your dmg
Try playing ap ezreal with kleptomancy instead.
Uh, I can use it on 99% of the support champs I play, and I do, because so far its been really fun to use
Good on bard and lux and anyone who likes to cast one spell followed by one auto.
